data.meta_description: Rumours of Aishwarya Rai Bachchan moving out of the Bachchan house are doing rounds on the internet. Some netizens noticed that Abhishek Bachchan liked a post on divorce which further fueled the rumours. Read this article to know all about it.
data.text:
Bollywood couple Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan got hitched in 2007. The rumours of their separation have been going around for a while now, and the rumoured news of Aishwarya moving out of the Bachchan house and netizens noticing Abhishek Bachchan liking a post on divorce have fueled them further.

Abhishek Bachchan Likes Instagram Post On Divorce

Recently, a journalist shared anarticle for Indian Express' Eye magazine on social media which was liked by Abhishek Bachchan. The post was about"When love stops being easy," captioned, "Divorce is never easy for anyone. Who doesn’t dream of a happily ever after or envision recreating those heartwarming videos of elderly couples holding hands as they cross the street? Yet, sometimes life doesn’t unfold as we hoped. But how do people cope when they separate after decades together, after spending a significant portion of their lives relying on each other for both big and small things?" The netizens have linked Abhishek's liking this post with the separation rumours.

Duty As Parents

Married for 16 years, the couple is parents to their adorable daughter, Aaradhya. According to an exclusive report by Times Now, the couple had been facing marital troubles for a while now, however, they stayed together till now for the sake of their child’s well-being.

No Confirmation From The Couple

Although, there hasn’t been any confirmation from the couple’s side. An old video of Aishwarya calling Abhishek the ‘best husband’ at an award show has the fans confused about the dynamics of their relationship. Well, if the divorce does happen, this won’t be the first time Abhishek Bachchan’s partner leaving him. Before getting hitched with Aishwarya, he was engaged to Karisma Kapoor but their relationship was short-lived.

Amitabh Bachchan Unfollowed Aishwarya Rai

Recently, the netizens could not find Amitabh Bachchan amongst Aishwarya’s Instagram followers which led to the suspicions of divorce between Aishwarya and Abhishek, and the Bachchan family feuds.

Saas-Bahu At War

According to the rumours over time, there’s no love lost between Aishwarya Rai and her mother-in-law, Jaya Bachchan. Apparently, they don’t get along well and this is also believed to be one of the major reasons behind the couple’s rumoured divorce.

Backlash From The In-Laws For Bold Scenes

According to the reports, Aishwarya faced a lot of backlash from her in-laws after her film, Ae Dil Hai Mushkil, because of the bold scenes.

Rai’s, Bachchan’s And Nanda’s Spotted Together

Amidst the rumours of divorce, Rai’s, Bachchan’s and Nanda’s were spotted together last night arriving at the Dhirubhai Ambani International School to cheer for Aaradhya who gave a stellar performance at the school’s annual function.
